website_summaries.verdict: A loose and flowing design with bat wing sleeves, this will quickly dress up a swimsuit for going from sea to land.
pros: These are easy to wear and super light to pack
It's polyester, but feels airy when worn and looks like more expensive cover ups
There's a range of styles and colors
Also works well over a tank top
cons: Since the fabric is sheer, your swimsuit is still on view

customer_reviews.title: Plus Sized Approved!!
customer_reviews.text: Ladies, I am a good size 16/18 and all my plus size divas know that sometimes an ONE SIZE FITS all, really is a one size fits small. This coverup fits nice and loose like you would expect a coverup to fit, also it has a good length to it. I am 5'5 and it comes down to my knees. The fabric is sheer polyester and usually these fabrics are somewhat itchy but this one is not. All in all, I like it so I gave it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Shawtrell J

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: Was a little concerned with all the colors but when I tried it on , I loved that it was a bit sheer and you can still see the color of my bathing suit under so I felt the colors didn’t clash. It’s very lightweight, perfect for the beach/pool. I loved the length as well. Some cover ups are either to short or too long, This one was just right. I always get really burned on my arms, even after applying Sun block, the sleeves fall perfectly on my arms and provide just the right coverage. I Will definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vickiana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful silky lightweight wrap, great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of this wrap against my skin - it is 100% polyester, I think, but has that super-soft silky feel. It will be perfect for wearing to the pool or the beach when I want to lounge around with a little extra coverage. The wrap falls to around your knee, opens in the front, and has side slits for easy movement. It has plenty of extra fabric if you want to pull it all the way around yourself. Great value for this!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Zimmermann

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty, colors and patterns go with everything!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! Beautiful colors and one-size-fits all styling. Perfect for a light cover over suit or to add color over solid slacks and camisole for an evening walk on the beach. Delivery was quick and it was packaged nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight top
customer_reviews.text: Nice flowy top. Looks exactly as pictured. I’m a 10/12 and it’s still roomie for me. This will work well for Texas summers!
customer_reviews.author: TheMacDonalds

customer_reviews.title: perfect dress up for jean, shorts etc
customer_reviews.text: The mixture of colors and design is beautiful, much nicer than photo on Amazon. Very light weight and feminine. great for swim cover up and casual beach wear. This will work well here in Florida year round. Love the price so much lower than many retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: Rhea T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Summer cover-up
customer_reviews.text: Very sheer and pretty. Great for the beach or over a cami with jeans. It can be worn several different ways. Summer in California is darn hot and this is a lightweight, everyday cover-up that goes with most colors day or night.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty true to color
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I ordered and it was delivered the very next day! And when it arrived, it was very pretty the colors are not dull or muddy. It is great over jean shorts or a bathing suit. It's versatility is wonderful and the material perfect for hot humid summers in florida.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is really pretty and light weight. Perfect for summer. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and it fits just right! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this cover up because it is lightweight and the colors are so pretty. She has a couple of other cover ups for her bathing suit that are thicker and cotton. This one will be perfect for those really hot days when she wants to be covered up, but with something lighter than the ones that she has.
customer_reviews.author: HarleyRiderForLife

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover up!
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like in the pictures! I’m around 5’3” and it hits to around the knee area. It’s not really see through because of the print so you can pair it with a white belt for a cover up/ kaftan style cardigan look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight coverup/jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It’s a soft light weight material that I not only use as a cover up but can put over a nice tank top and a pair jeans and I’ve got a nice casual outfit win win would definitely buy another style from this company!
customer_reviews.author: Lavona S.Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Arrived just as shown in photo. Lightweight and stylish! Love it! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly! Comfortable,lightweight,beautiful and stylish! Great to throw over a tank top in the summer! Ordered a small, I am 5 ft 1 inches. Would love to order more in different patterns! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: BerryCherry

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Nice and airy material. Not itchy or scratchy. I bought 2 and I am glad I did. Nice cover over swimsuit or just dressing up a casual outfit. Colors are just like the photos. Fit is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great nursing tank cover up!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover up for tank tops in the summer! I am currently nursing and most of the summer options for nursing tops are spaghetti straps (which I prefer not to wear). I love wearing this top over tank tops. It’s very light and airy. Beautiful patten. I wear small and it fits great, large and long but not overly so. It makes me feel stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: beach/pool coverup
customer_reviews.text: The coverup appears in person as it appears in the photo and description. The one I purchased is seafoam green, with dark pink and red flowers. The medium fits as expected. On a 5'4" woman the garment falls to mid-leg, in a curved fashion. It's a light, thin, see-through coverup. There aren't any buttons or clasps, it just falls open. The sleeves are large and loose. If you don't need anything more than a minimal coverup this functions quite well.
customer_reviews.author: beloved

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This was great! I really love the color and pattern, exactly as pictured. This is beautiful and lightweight. I can use this at the pool as a coverup. I can use this at church as a discrete nursing cover. Or wear it in any season because it's so lightweight. I can layer it over a t-shirt, casual blouse, cami, swimsuit, or even a sweater in the winter. I am in between sizes so I ordered the larger and it is a bit bigger than I was expecting, however that's probably my fault because I wanted it to be light and flowy, which it certainly is. It came quickly too!! I really love it and would love to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Very soft!
customer_reviews.text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. The pattern is not my favorite although in person, it is better than the image. So if you like it a little in pictures, you’ll probably like it even more in person. All the edges are surged so its harder to tell what is right side out which I think is a good thing. I have another swim coverup from amazon so I was expecting similar, scratchy material. This one is actually very nice and soft. Pleasant to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: -shopping mama

customer_reviews.title: Pretty & Airy Accent Piece
customer_reviews.text: First off, the print of the fabric is vibrant and beautiful. The scarf-like fabric is airy and lightweight. The garment itself is pretty much a rectangular piece of fabric that is folded over and stitched up the sides in such a way that leaves openings for arms. I personally would have liked some sort of actual sleeve allowance on the garment like other kimino-style cover-ups, however due to the feather weight of the fabric it does drape nice enough around the body to detract from the simple "boxiness" of the cut. Over all it's a nice garment, pretty enough for throwing on as an accent piece over a swimsuit, or tank.
customer_reviews.author: YahwehsBlessed1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect staple for any wardrobe!
customer_reviews.text: This is so versatile and cute- I love it! You can wear it with anything and it looks great! It's a great staple piece for your wardrobe- not to mention perfect over a bathing suit all summer long! And not to mention I got it for half the price many similar ones on Amazon. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kami Keegan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for size medium. Lovely print!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit. It’s perfectly loose—it’s flowy but doesn’t look like you’re wearing a size too big. I’m 5’5” and 150 lbs. I love the print...that a lot to say since all I wear is solids. I’love pair it with a black dress and also with jeans and a white top. Sooo beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: OV15

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Like this item for its versatility. Gonna wear it as a bathing suit cover up but also plan on wearing it with jeans. Can't beat the price. I purchased the leopard print and also the blue floral print. Wish it had a velcro to keep it closed as an option. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: tt

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors, thin material, good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very vibrant colors. Thin material but for the price and in the Florida heat, it will be great for the pool or the beach. One size, and it is very flowy. Great cover up for the summer. I wouldn't wear it if going to a fancier place or trying to impress, but for regular walking to your community pool or on a family vacation or something like that, totally works.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Chavez

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Summer coverup!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite coverup for the summer! Very lightweight and flowy, yet classy! Material is soft chiffon (not the cheap scratchy kind)! I’m very picky with leopard print (don’t want it to look too gaudy), and this was my favorite one out of all coverups. The colors are beautiful and neutral. Highly recommend! For reference, I’m 5’1, 105-110 lbs, petite frame.
customer_reviews.author: Aggie

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was truly skeptical that my coverup for a little over $5 plus free prime shipping was even going to be any good. Well I received it in just a few days, its adorable, good quality, I chose Medium but probably could've gotten away with Large just so that it could be a little longer. This specific print was the only one being offered at this price but glad I took the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Amaz my fav

customer_reviews.title: Cute coverup!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with this coverup. The colors are vibrant and it looks cute over a bathing suit. I usually wear a size 6. I purchased the medium and it fits great. I would consider buying in other colors. It would look nice with a tank top and jeans as well. Great value for the price. The item is as described and I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: It's ok...
customer_reviews.text: It is not well made the hem is not well done. Good luck getting the fold creases out of it without melting it. You have to iron because they don't come out by laundering. And the temp has to be right on. Too low, nothing happens. Too high and you melt it. It is pretty, the fabric is not clingy, very flattering but the poorly done hem make it look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it...
customer_reviews.text: I also received this product for free for my honest feedback. It came quickly and nicely packaged in a plastic bag. While the print and material was nice to the touch, I'd have to say that I can't get over the awkward way that it hung on my body for this "one size fits all" cover up. I kept trying to adjust it by pulling it more forward, then more back, but still couldn't get it to look flattering on me. Again, it's a nice pattern and feel, but I definitely don't see myself using it. I'm 5'6'' and usually wear a size 4 or 6.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Was this worm already?
customer_reviews.text: The writing on the package is smeared. There are no paper tags (product name, etc) on the coverup which leads me to believe that it may have been worn already. There are no tags on the coverup at all that indicates the size, care instructions, etc. This is weird. Haven't worn this yet. Debating returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: T. Farmer

customer_reviews.title: It Looks Perfect! High Quality Kimono!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my, I love it! I ordered the black floral, and it looks amazing! I can't wait for vacation now! This will look great with my tanks and capris! I'm planning on ordering a few more in different colors too!
customer_reviews.author: Df

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love it . Perfect for summer. Great material , versatile , very light . Shipping was fast. I love the look 😊 I also received a free gift card with this purchase Update: as I said in the previous paragraph I’m still happy with my purchase but I try to claim the gift I was given and I contact the email. They email me back saying that that is not their product so maybe the seller is using somebody else’s I formation to scam people just be awarded of it .
customer_reviews.author: Karina Malpartida

customer_reviews.title: Runs a lil large but am a big fan of this.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute kimono, & so many patterns to choose from, so I bought two more styles after receiving this one that I fell in love with. I feel like these are perfect for summer. They do run a bit large. I bought a size S and it’s still quite big but it’s not a big deal as it’s just a kimono or cover for swimsuit if you’re at the pool/beach. Love these. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this kimono! The colors are beautiful, it fits perfectly and already I've gotten a ton of compliments on it and I've only worn it once (I just got it yesterday). I'll be ordering additional colors to add to my wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight, chic top...just right for summer!!
customer_reviews.text: You really can't beat the price for this gorgeous top. It is very light-weight and perfect to throw over a camisole on a hot summer day. You can pair it with a pair of leggings/skinny jeans and cute heeled sandals and it's perfect for the office or even a girl's night out. It also looks great as a throw over a swimsuit. I normally wear an XL and I ordered this top in XL and it fit perfectly (maybe even a hair larger than I expected). I am absolutely in love with this top, especially considering the price; I like it so much that I plan on ordering another 1 or 2 in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Love this top! Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The item is exactly as described. It fit perfectly and comfortable. The material is very cute and exactly what was shown. It will pack and travel perfectly. I bought it for a cruise. It was a perfect lightweight cover-up and I love the way the colors looked in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Lin

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Cool
customer_reviews.text: I received and wore this today! The colors are beautiful especially the blue which gives the entire piece a perfect pop within the pattern of the coverup. This is a stylish piece to add to your summer wardrobe. It can be warn to the beach or over a tank top and shorts or capris. I do wish is was smaller in size. That's the only slight issue I have with it. Overall, I would definitely buy another in a different color and pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Coverup
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to wear to work and it looks and fits great. It’s light enough so you won’t get hot. I received the item yesterday and I’m wearing it now. I’m glad I decided to purchase this item. If this item is in your cart, you definitely should buy it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: The feel of this is absolutely amazing it's so soft. (My son also loves to hold it to sleep). Its also very light and perfect for hot days. I use it to throw on just to run to mailbox. Perfect at the beach to when walking your covered up enough but still can show a little. I love it and would recommend. Also picture doesn't show how nice pattern is.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: Nice coverup
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cover up. It can be worn with jeans and a tank top, a dress, or over a bathing suit. I like the colors because they are not too loud or bright. The size fits as expected. Good quality for price. Overall it’s a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: MD04

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to dress up a black top and jeans. I get so many compliments when I wear this. The colors are so nice and It goes so well with jeans or leggings. Will purchase on of the other colors too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beach coverup worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty cover up. Perfect to wear to the beach or pool. Great for vacations. You can really even wear this on top of a tight black dress or just wear it like Kimono style. The price can’t be beat either!!!
customer_reviews.author: madlen

customer_reviews.title: Too Small!
customer_reviews.text: Way too small, I wear a L-XL this was more like a small. Pretty fabric, very disappointed in the fit!
customer_reviews.author: AshBroom

customer_reviews.title: Flowy, bell sleeved and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a coverup for my river day. I love it so much that I've been wearing it with everyday clothes as well. It is light weight, sheer, beautiful and pairs well with pretty much any of my outfits. I will definitely buy more in different colors! Great buy! Especially for $5!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and looks great as a swim suit cover up or a with a pair of jeans. Do note that it ripped on the stitching shortly after I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: ZAG

customer_reviews.title: Too small, cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, smaller than I expected, fabric a little heavier than anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Valorie Grogan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cover up! The print is very pretty and the material is a nice quality, perfect for the summer over a tank top or bathing suit. Plan to buy in other colors!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Turner

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and versatile
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these before and wanted to try them again. It's a little shorter than expected but still like it. Very versatile. Can dress it up or go casual. Very light weight and can be washed in machine.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie in FL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cover-Up
customer_reviews.text: This cover up is exactly as I expected. Very stylish and perfect to throw on when you want to get up and move around the pool. I have also worn with denim shorts and black tank top, great as a summer layering piece. I would suggest sizing up as I typically wear a M which is the size I ordered but wish I had ordered a large.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Boblett

customer_reviews.title: Boho,vibrant, and sexy
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and silky, sheer yet you can still see all of the vibrant colors. I plan on wearing over a camisole with jeans for a boho look. Well made and great fit. For reference, usually a 12/14 or L/XL. Stylish and beautiful, so colorful I feel like it would go with about anything.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Smith

customer_reviews.title: BIG
customer_reviews.text: Ok...so I am a L/XL and this is huge! Thank god you can tie it but when you do, you have to do it loosely or it pulls at the armpits. I am not real happy with it but will keep it as I am sure others will be just as bad.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on sale this fall. Unfortunately I didnt get to wear it outside but I'm excited for spring to wear it. It's a beautiful color and fits great very light too.
customer_reviews.author: Alycia

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and great with a sleeveless top!
customer_reviews.text: I like the thickness of this cover-up/shawl. It isn't see through like all of my other ones but it is still lightweight. I wear it at work over a sleeveless top with leggings or jeans. It is easy to launder. I put it in my delicates bag with my masks and hang it up to dry. It is comfortable and doesn't get hot.
customer_reviews.author: Ninnyfofo

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for summer
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed. I wanted something I could wear over a bathing suit and also pair with a tank top and shorts/jeans. It’s the perfect length (and I’m tall), it almost comes to the bottom of my butt.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, lightweight cover up for the beach or pool!
customer_reviews.text: Light, Comfortable & beautiful bathing suit cover up! I absolutely love this! The colors are vibrant and just as pictured and described! I love all of their collection! I have a few of these and through them in my bag to go to the pool or beach. Don’t hesitate! Get this! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Linh

customer_reviews.title: will wear year round
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in lavender gray and can’t wait to also get leopard print. Think it will be a great piece to transition into fall as well as a coverup for summer. I am 5’3”, 125 lbs and got a size small.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Love this, wear quite often as cover up and even as a throw on over a tank w jeans or shorts. Print is pretty and as pictured. Fit is nice and haven’t had issues yet with quality. Would probably want to hand wash delicate tho and not dry. It’s a delicate feeling fabric
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Best Coverup Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This the the best coverup ever!!! Love it. So lightweight, Compliments any outfit you wear Jean's, Capris, Leggings or dress pants and it's so roomy. Fits any size you are.
customer_reviews.author: N. Gaughran

customer_reviews.title: A great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a friend and she simply loved it. Nice colors would go with anything. Perfect to cover up while at the beach and especially on a cruise. Nice enough to wear dressed casual to dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Al W.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and chic!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty piece, well made and colorful. Excellent price and value for the money. I find it slightly big for a small but that’s just my preference. Otherwise I love it!
customer_reviews.author: KJ Uhl

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and versatile
customer_reviews.text: This will be your go-to for swimsuit coverup, over a t-shirt with shorts or as a light wrap for a fancy date night. It's very, very pretty and looks like you bought it on an exotic vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Bookkat

customer_reviews.title: Nice but falls off shoulders
customer_reviews.text: Its nice and lightweight although it does not stay on my shoulders for some reason so I am constantly having to adjust it which is annoying. I bought another one with a different design from a different seller that doesn't do that
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Grech

customer_reviews.title: More bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece because it like getting a 2 for one deal this coverup is light and airy and soft. It could easily be worn on the beach and also paired with a nice pair of jeans for a night out.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shall. Super lightweight and airy. Plus its soooo pretty. Feels long lasting quality. Will be buying more again!
customer_reviews.author: Prophet

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty and thin cover up, it is going to be of great use to me for this summer. I just wish it was a little longer. I got an XL and the sleeves are shorter than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.&Mrs.Orona

customer_reviews.title: This is as soft and airy as can be--
customer_reviews.text: It is a wonderful beach cover up. And is so pretty that I almost had it stolen from me. A lady at the pool tried to walk off with it but I realized it was missing and stopped her before she got away with my cover up. I use it everyday and am ordering another. The colors are so pretty and the cover up is just far more than I expected--try this one--you will be pleased!
customer_reviews.author: e vosburg

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Just received my shirt. The colors were very vibrant, it was soft and light weight and fit just as described. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katpow

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, not only for bathing suit cover.
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. The product had a bit of a plastic smell. But it went away as soon as I hung it up and it aired out. The fabric is soft and it looks very nice. I’m a size medium and it fits well. It is a good cover up for the pool, beach, or even for every day wear.
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: Sheer swim cover/shirt over cami
customer_reviews.text: Good as a swim cover or as a sheer shirt worn over a cami or tank top. You could tie the ends in a knot or tie together if you are slim enough. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Venus Orchid

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors, stylish, doesn’t look cheap
customer_reviews.text: Stylish eye catching, awesome colors for my complexion. I wish I could find more kimonos like this. Most of them look so cheap, but this one has flair.
customer_reviews.author: Talia

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: SO CUTE. seriously recommend! I got this one and the purple with red flowers. It’s a good material, fits as promised and just so cute and it’s even better for the price. It looks just like some of the ones at higher end boutiques! So perfect for summer. 💕
customer_reviews.author: daisy alcauter

customer_reviews.title: Good product/ good quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is nice and fits as expected. Don't order up. Will order again from this company. The leopard print will go with so much!
customer_reviews.author: Aundra Williams

customer_reviews.title: This one piece changes the game!
customer_reviews.text: Great to travel with an exactly what you need to ture a basic outfit into a dynamic outfit❤ Order a size or 2 larger for comfort and a more flowing look.
customer_reviews.author: Red Moon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when the his arrived. The fabric was much softer than similar cover ups that I’ve seen in department stores. The print was nice and the fit is flattering. I will have to see what other patterns I can order.
customer_reviews.author: KMK

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lightweight
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is very nice. It has a small blemish on it but I need it for the pool so it's okay. It's still beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: beautiful fit and colors
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors! Very vibrant! Definitely one size fits all. Light weight material, perfect for the beach as a cover-up or simply a great (sexy) cover-up for a nice lounge dress.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy W.

customer_reviews.title: Get yourself one!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Love how these kimonos fit! I gave it a four star, only because the fabric snags so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Too big on a small frame
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying to find a beach/pool cover up and really had high hopes for this one. But it ended up being like the others I've tried that haven't worked - it's too big and just hangs on me. I'm 5'4", 120/125 lbs, 34C or 34D, 26 inch waist, 36 inch hips. The pattern is nice enough. The material is what you'd expect for the price. But I just can't find any way to make the garment look flattering on me, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Mbmcc813

customer_reviews.title: I need to buy more :)
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful it fits as expected washes great and I got so many compliments when I wore it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the length of this throw
customer_reviews.text: I really like this throw. It fits right, & is not too long as I’m on the shorter side. Works well with a tank & skinny jeans.
customer_reviews.author: HOLLY J

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking cover up looks very classy
customer_reviews.text: The product is very nice I bought to go with a white pair of capris. Will be able to wear with 5-6 different color of items. Not limited to one color great value for the price. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Cute and a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this coverup! It's sheer but offers me nice coverage when I don't necessarily want to feel like I'm on display. I can also wear this with shorts and a top in the summertime. I got this in snake skin print as well as a floral--I love them both!
customer_reviews.author: A. O.

customer_reviews.title: Very colorful
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely loved it. It really reminds you of a peacock. Super lightweight, soft and very well made. I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Steve1234

customer_reviews.title: So light and feminine!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved how light and feminine this is!!! Can use this as a beach cover up or wear a tank and put this over it (tied or untied). Went to but another one, but discount no longer available. I don't spend a lot of money on myself, so I would have only purchased it if it was still a discounted price. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Evan Bush

customer_reviews.title: Great cover up
customer_reviews.text: Quite surprised by the quality considering how little I paid for it. It's got a nice length, very airy.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Wasser

customer_reviews.title: Looks great over my outfit
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it is so light that I can wear it over my summer outfits and have no added weight
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: This cover up is perfect for swim wear and even layering over a top with leggings. It’s a great size, lightweight and easy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Dane Dane

customer_reviews.title: Live it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is beautiful!!!! I thought the stripe was more purple turns out is more blue but it is beautiful !!! Agree the one size fits all is always a crap shoot bIt this is very roomy so should work for most!!!! Quick shipping and great price
customer_reviews.author: Lacojax

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is in question.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a XL and returned for a 2X. The fit was exactly the same, as the XL. There is no tag indicating the size so its a guess as to what the vendor shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Jabz

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer wear ☀️
customer_reviews.text: Now that it’s close to summer time... I dislike wearing tight clothes! That’s why I seen the khaki kimono and ordered it. The material is very soft and the product did not come wrinkled! It’s not see through like other kimonos can be... the material feels very nice as well. It’s nice just to throw it on with a tank top, shorts, and some sandals!
customer_reviews.author: Maribel perez

customer_reviews.title: More than a beach cover-up
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this beach cover-up. The multiple colors goes with lots outfits. A beautiful dress up for office, casual or dressy wear.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Milford

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easily one of my fav things to wear! The color is great and can be used for a casual evening. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love this design and the material is so soft and lush feeling! Perfect for a swimsuit coverup and could even be worn during the day over another top.
customer_reviews.author: Liz F

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and goes with anything!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this kimono. It is great quality, the colors are very vibrant, it's the perfect length for me, and it goes with so many options. Can be used as either a bathing suit cover up or over jean shorts and a tank. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Cute Overlay
customer_reviews.text: Green floral is a sweet overlay with camisole. Soft coloring, light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Golamis

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: I like that this kimono is so light, perfect for adding a cute accessory without getting too hot! I ordered it under a deal and bought a 3XL it definitely must run small as a top since I'm probably like a Medium and it fits like one. Overall love adding it to this summer's wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Shea

customer_reviews.title: Fit well and beautiful pattern
customer_reviews.text: The product fit well. It's a beautiful over shirt for tanks and short sleeves. The pattern is very nice. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: M. Shufelt

customer_reviews.title: Women’s Floral Beach Kimono
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty design and colors. Good material. It says bathing cover up but I would of worn it with several outfits. I am 5’3” and it was too big for me.
customer_reviews.author: cjoseph

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for - and was even prettier than the photos.
customer_reviews.author: TreeHugginMom

customer_reviews.title: Cute and seems like great quality
customer_reviews.text: It's very pretty and doesn't seem like cheap fabric. It compliments a simple outfit very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

product_meta.title: EyonMe Beach Coverups Chiffon Cardigan Kimono Summer Swimsuit for Women
product_meta.description:
Summer Swimsuit Cover Ups For Women
Looking for something chic to bright up your tour? Then a light and cool cover ups for swimwear is just for you. Simple to pack and stress-free to wear. They are the perfect addition to your summer time travel bag. Discover endless options that make your vacation getaway a breeze!

Premium Gifts for Loved Ones
This Stylish and Sexy kimono cover up is a must have for you this summer!Best gift choice for your friends, mothers, lovers on her birthday, summer Hawaii vacations, honeymoon trip, family travels, mother's day, valentine's day and so on.

Basic Information
Premium Material: 100% polyester, sheer chiffon
Size: Five different sizes for your preference.( Please refer to the picture for detailed size) Versatile Styles: Women cover up, bathing suit cover ups, beach cover ups, swimsuit cover ups for women and more.
Various Occasions: Swimming, cruise, casual, going out, street, pool and beach vacation wear.
Tips for Cleaning: Machine wash cold with like colors, gentle cycle, do not bleach, tumble dry low

Package Included
1 x kimono cardigan

Warm Note
1.Please allow 0.4-0.8 inches difference due to manual measurement.
2.Due to different monitors and lighting,the color of the actual iten may be slightly different with the above images.
feature_bullets: 【PREMIUM MATERIAL】 100% Chiffon.High quality chiffon material, soft, lightweight, breathable and comfortable to wear.
【ELEGANT STYLE】Loose kimono, bat sleeve, fashionable floral printed, thin cardigans. Help you keep your skin from exposing to the sun, perfect for spring, summer, autumn.
【VARIOUS OCCASIONS】Ideal for wearing at beach, swimming pool, poolside tanning salon, and Water Park, and all-match for bikini, skirt, summer dress, T-shirt and shorts.
【Size】 S,M,L,XL,2XL,3XL,six different sizes are available for you to choose from them. You can check the detailed size picture to choose the suitable size for you.
【Vicky 365/24/7】 Our expert would answer any questions, problem solved, no need to return to store
